Posts.Content: Hi thank you for your reply. It has no lump- it is the other breast with the benign lump. The breast with the rash is so painful though. The doctor I saw today at my GP practice said if there is no lump he’s not worried. But after reading about IBC there doesn’t have to be a lump. I get seen privately on Tuesday to try and get some answers and I’m so scared  this baby is so longed for and I keep getting health scares/problems! I also have lumps in my mouth and see an oral surgeon next week.cant cope with all the worry
Posts.Title: Inflammatory breast cancer???

Posts.Content: Could I send u a pic of the skin somehow? Just for your opinion? Thank u for your reply!! Xx
Posts.Title: Inflammatory breast cancer???

Posts.Content: to cut a long story short... I’m 29.  last August I was sent to the breast clinic due to right sided breast pain that had been happening for around 6-8 months. It was in one area, in the lower quadrant.  The first thing they did was an ultrasound. They scanned both breasts. They asked me did I know about a lump in the left side? Which I didn’t.  I saw the consultant. He didn’t mention the right painful breast as he was concerned about this lump in the left side. They brought me back a few hours later for a punch biopsy.  The next week was awful, waiting for the result. It was benign. I was over the moon and moved on from it, just dealing with the pain in the right breast.  Anyway, I fell pregnant in September. The pain seemed to subside. Although in December it started again and this time further up and  into my armpit. I saw a doctor. She looked at my breast and said she was sure it was nothing, probably anxiety.  Ovdr the last few days the pain is back in the original area and now I have a rash in the same place!! So my worst nightmare comes up on google- could it be IBC? i have an appointment with my gp at lunchtime.  I also have a private appointment with a breast surgeon on Tuesday as I’m so anxious.  I just wondered if anyone had experienced anything similar. I’m so scared with being pregnant, would I be able to have tests or treatment without harming my baby?
Posts.Title: Inflammatory breast cancer???

Posts.Content: ruby rose, just wondering if you can help me.  I posted a few days ago but not much of a response. So unsettled tonight. i have breast pain with a red rash in one area. It has some spots in it and one seems ulcerated, like a small hole.  I’m so scared, did you have any symptoms like it? I’m fearing IBC. i have a private breast clinic appointment tomorrow, what should I expect to happen? hope you are well x
Posts.Title: So worried IBC concerns can’t stop crying

Posts.Content: It’s not nornal is it? I’m so stressed with it. My husband tells me to to forget about it but getting dressed and wearing a seatbelt causes pain so how can I forget about it? Never had the rash until the last week, it’s so annoying, the internet is great but also terrifying!! Xx
